name: Extra Slayer Talent
text: Through long practice, you have learned how to perform a special talent.
benefit: You gain one additional slayer talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this slayer talent.
special: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another slayer talent.
text_zh: 经年累月的摘取目标让你练就了更多杀人技巧。
benefit_zh: 你获得一个额外的杀手天赋，你必须满足获得此杀手天赋的前提条件。
special_zh: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次选择，你需要选择一个额外的杀手天赋。
